GSD.description:
btrfs: do not start relocation until in progress drops are done

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.13 by commit 5e70bc827b563caf22e1203428cc3719643de5aa. For more details please see the references link.
